millions of the processes there are two main categories of HPC there is high
throughput computing HTC and then there is HPC HPC which is also a little bit

a second again independent processes when one starts and another finish

the tightly coupled workloads where the compute nodes say must be similar the network must be fast and

these workloads are typically based on MPI so why use AWS for HPC well why do I
prefer AWS for HPC over a supercomputer and it is for these reasons first
there's any number of architectural options you can pick the memory to
